Context:
George Brown College is committed to ending racism in its community and working towards becoming an equitable and inclusive institution. This involves actions from every member of the college community. The college has an Anti-Racism website where individuals can learn about ongoing initiatives and what they can do to support these efforts.

Contact Information:
- Phone: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Website: Anti-Racism website (implicit)

Social Media Hub: Available on the website

Important Notes:
- Information on the website is subject to change without notice.
- Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
